features.name: Pipeline Canvas
features.description: Visual workflow system for designing and executing protein engineering pipelines with drag-and-drop nodes

features.name: HTTP Request Node
features.description: HTTP Request node for making API calls to external endpoints with configurable method, URL, authentication, headers, query params, and body

features.name: Pipeline Node Config
features.description: Configuration panel for pipeline nodes with input/output panels and parameter settings

features.name: Execution Engine
features.description: Node execution system that handles API calls, template resolution, and response processing

features.name: Pipeline Store
features.description: Zustand store for managing pipeline state, nodes, edges, and execution logs

features.name: Chat Panel
features.description: AI chat interface for natural language interaction with molecular visualization

features.name: Molstar Viewer
features.description: 3D molecular structure visualization using Molstar library

features.name: Code Editor
features.description: Monaco editor integration for code editing and execution

features.name: File Browser
features.description: File management interface for browsing and uploading PDB files
